nodes.title: Learn the basics of Kotlin
nodes.desc: Understand the fundamentals of Kotlin programming language, including variables, data types, and control structures. [Kotlin Official Documentation](https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/)

nodes.title: Set up the development environment
nodes.desc: Install Android Studio or IntelliJ IDEA and configure the Kotlin plugin to start coding. [Android Studio](https://developer.android.com/studio), [IntelliJ IDEA](https://www.jetbrains.com/idea/)

nodes.title: Build a command-line application
nodes.desc: Create a simple command-line application to get started with Kotlin. [Kotlin Command-Line App](https://kotlinlang.org/docs/tutorials/command-line.html)

nodes.title: Build an Android app
nodes.desc: Use Kotlin to build a simple Android app and learn about Android development. [Android App Development](https://developer.android.com/guide)

nodes.title: Learn about Kotlin's interoperability with Java
nodes.desc: Understand how Kotlin can be used with Java and how to call Java code from Kotlin. [Kotlin Interoperability](https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html)

nodes.title: Read Kotlin books
nodes.desc: Read books on Kotlin to deepen your understanding of the language. [Kotlin Books](https://kotlinlang.org/docs/books.html)

nodes.title: Participate in Kotlin communities
nodes.desc: Join online communities, forums, and social media groups to connect with other Kotlin developers. [Kotlin Communities](https://kotlinlang.org/community/)

nodes.title: Attend Kotlin conferences
nodes.desc: Attend conferences and meetups to learn from experts and network with other developers. [Kotlin Conferences](https://kotlinlang.org/community/events.html)

nodes.title: Take online courses
nodes.desc: Take online courses to learn Kotlin and improve your skills. [Kotlin Courses](https://kotlinlang.org/docs/courses.html)

nodes.title: Watch Kotlin videos
nodes.desc: Watch videos on Kotlin to learn from experts and get a visual understanding of the language. [Kotlin Videos](https://kotlinlang.org/docs/videos.html)

nodes.title: Understand Kotlin syntax
nodes.desc: Familiarize yourself with Kotlin's concise and expressive syntax, including functions, classes, and interfaces. [Kotlin Syntax](https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/basic-syntax.html)

nodes.title: Learn object-oriented programming
nodes.desc: Understand the principles of OOP in Kotlin, including encapsulation, inheritance, and polymorphism. [Kotlin OOP](https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/classes.html)

nodes.title: Master functional programming
nodes.desc: Learn about higher-order functions, lambdas, and closures in Kotlin. [Kotlin Functional Programming](https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/lambdas.html)

nodes.title: Understand null safety
nodes.desc: Learn how Kotlin's null safety features help prevent NullPointerExceptions. [Kotlin Null Safety](https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/null-safety.html)

nodes.title: Learn about coroutines
nodes.desc: Understand how Kotlin's coroutines provide a way to write asynchronous code that's much simpler and more efficient. [Kotlin Coroutines](https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/coroutines-overview.html)

nodes.title: Understand Kotlin's type system
nodes.desc: Learn about Kotlin's type system, including type inference, type parameters, and type aliases. [Kotlin Type System](https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/type-system.html)

nodes.title: Learn about Kotlin's standard library
nodes.desc: Familiarize yourself with Kotlin's standard library, including functions for working with collections, strings, and more. [Kotlin Standard Library](https://kotlinlang.org/api/latest/jvm/stdlib/)

nodes.title: Practice with Kotlin Koans
nodes.desc: Complete the Kotlin Koans tutorial to get hands-on experience with Kotlin. [Kotlin Koans](https://kotlinlang.org/docs/tutorials/koans.html)
